name: The Friendsgiving Wars
description:
A game me and a team made for the Yogscast game jam!

The team was:
Me - doing programming and slapping everything together
SonikBuster - Music, videos and 2D art
Afiq "mutasionisis" Yusof - 3D modeling
MerleyMonster - level design assistance
Alexzen - audio stuff that didn't get implemented sadly
